document.full_text: jean-bertrand aristide, the former president forced into exile twice, returned home on friday, only days before a presidential runoff intended to settle months of discord.
document.title: just days before election, aristide returns to cheers and uncertainty in haiti
lines_and_colors: jean-bertrand aristide, the former president forced into exile twice, returned home on friday, only days before a presidential runoff intended to settle months of discord.
